page.title: 04HANSLOPE LEISURE
page.content: IN THE VILLAGE HALL THERE IS A YOUTH CLUB TO WHICH MOSTLY HANSLOPE CHILDREN GO. AND THERE IS KARATE AND JUDO AND THERE ARE DISCO'S.BADMINTON IS ON AT 7.00PM ON WEDNESDAY AND TABLE TENNIS IS ON AT 7.00PM MONDAYS. AND YOU NEED TO HAVE A MEMBERSHIP CARD TO GET IN OTHERIWISE YOU CAN'T GET IN.THERE IS SUNDAY SCHOOL WHICH LOTS OF LITTLE CHILDEN GO TO.THERE IS CHURCH WHERE ALL THE OLD PEOPLE GO AND SING ALONG. QUITE A LOT OF CASTLETHORPE PEOPLE COME TO OUR LEISURE THINGS THAT GO ON IN HANSLOPE. IN THE SUMMER YOU CAN GO UP THE CHURCH TOWER AND LOOK OVER HANSLOPE.EVERY BODY LISTENS TO RECORDS AND TAPES. THERE ARE ALSO JUMBLE SALES WHERE LOTS OF OLD PEOPLE GO.WE ALSO HAVE FILM SHOWS AT THE HANSLOPE SCHOOL BUT THEY ARE TOO EXPENSIVE AT 40P. By K.Aston
